org.modelio.api.editor

Interface IExternDocumentChangeListener


  • public interface IExternDocumentChangeListener
    Interface that rich note editors must provide.

    The editor must unregister this interface when closing, by using IEditionService.unregisterListener(IExternDocumentChangeListener)

    • Method Summary

      Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      void onOriginalDeleted(MObject model)
      Called when the original content or the model object has been externally deleted.
      void onOriginalModified(MObject model)
      Called when the original content has been externally modified.

    • Method Detail

      • onOriginalDeleted

        void onOriginalDeleted(MObject model)
        Called when the original content or the model object has been externally deleted.

        The edited file is still here and won't be touched.

        Parameters:
        model - the deleted model object

      • onOriginalModified

        void onOriginalModified(MObject model)
        Called when the original content has been externally modified.

        The edited file is still here and won't be touched.

        The implementation may choose to

        • keep its version,
        • reload the file by calling IRichNoteFileManager.getRichNoteFile(...),
        • close the editor,
        • run a diff/merge,
        • ask the user for what to do,
        • ...
        Parameters:
        model - the deleted model object
